title: Beautiful Modern Two Bed in the Heart of Fenway!
posting_body: Beautiful two bedroom apartment in a fantastic location!
Perfect layout for flexible living options.
Call today for more details and a showing.
•	Current Landlord reference (please do not just submit the contact information for the landlord)
•	Employment verification (either an offer letter from the employer confirming the salary or pay stubs.
•	Encore deposit check for first month’s rent
Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!
Share your search criteria with me here:
